Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Washington
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Washington, Laramie, Chicago and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Washington, Laramie, Chicago and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Washington.

Allow extra travel time.
